### CalendarLayout enumeration
</br>


#### Represents the layout options for a calendar.

```csharp
public enum CalendarLayout
```

### Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| SingleGrid | `0` | Single line grid layout. |
| DoubleGrid | `1` | Double line grid layout. |
| AsciiSingleGrid | `2` | ASCII single line grid layout. |
| AsciiDoubleGrid | `3` | ASCII double line grid layout. |
